pages.text:
About Chef Keith Meyer
​
After 10 years in the financial world, Chef Keith decided to pursue his passion for cooking. He moved to New York City and attended the French Culinary Institute.
​
After graduating, he furthered his craft in New York at San Domenico and Lever House, both Michelin star restaurants, under notable chefs Odetta Fada and Dan Silverman, respectively.
​
After moving to Southwest Florida, Chef Keith soon became a Punta Gorda favorite, serving for six years as Trabue’s executive chef/general manager. His finance background helped him run both the front and the back of a chef-driven house where he could be intensely hands-on and never had to sacrifice quality.
​
Chef Keith utilizes French techniques while keeping the menu fresh, varied and approachable. He continues his practice of visiting the dining room to reveal cooking techniques and share in guests’ satisfaction.
​
Chef Keith is married to NBC2 News Anchor Stacey Deffenbaugh
Chef Keith Meyer - FM Dons
Chef Keith Meyer - FM Dons

LOOKING TO HOST A PARTY?
​
Private party rooms available for Private Events!
​
F.M. DON'S is the perfect venue
for your special event
Our Private Dining Room provides endless opportunities for an unforgettable experience - day or night.  Chef Keith will personally craft your menu so your event is special and memorable.   Our space is perfect for a business meeting, private dinner, baby or wedding shower or celebrating a special milestone.
​
Please contact us below to find out more details and to book your next event!

Centrally located in historic Downtown Punta Gorda, FM Don’s is a place you can enjoy delicious food 7 days a week.
​
Led by Chef/Partner Keith Meyer, FM Don’s offers unparalleled service and cuisine unlike any other in Charlotte County.
​
Everybody who comes to this town loves the history, the harbor, the story of Punta Gorda. We’ve created a space dedicated to telling just a part, of that story, where you can come with your whole family, relish in delectably fresh food, and see the history of Punta Gorda on the walls.
F.M. Don’s seats 260 guests and has a private function room that seats 45. Outdoor patio dining is available. Our culture is simple, a genuine desire to meet and exceed the expectations of our guests.
F.M. DON'S
PUNTA GORDA, FL
